creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: chair cover of deep blue velvet with design of Foo dog, lotus, crane medallion, and sacred vessel in gold.  border of profile dragons in blue velvet on gold ground.  inner binding of gold brocade; outer binding of black and glod brocade.  Threads much worn and broken.  cotton lining
title: Chair cover
